txt.en: Heat waves can be found around Hobbiton.\n\nYou should defeat heat waves to help ease the discomfort of festival patrons.
Tansy Tighfield is at the Party Tree in the Shire.\n\nYou should return to Tansy Tighfield.
'Well done, [placeholder]! I can feel the drop in the heat already. I am sure I shall receive fewer complaints now.'
You must defeat the flare of terrible summer heat!
You must defeat the flare of terrible summer heat!
You must defeat the flare of terrible summer heat!
You must defeat the flare of terrible summer heat!
You must defeat the flare of terrible summer heat!
Heat Waves can be found in the area near the Party Tree in the Shire.\n\nYou should defeat Heat Waves.
A number of Summer Festival patrons are suffering in the intense summer heat.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'Oh dear. It is terribly hot today, is it not? I worry that the good patrons of the festival will succumb to the heat! Would you be so kind as to banish any bursts of heat that you see hanging around? The warmth is too much to endure.'
